description: This file defines API endpoints for managing recipes using FastAPI. It includes route handlers for creating, listing, retrieving, updating, and deleting recipes, utilizing dependencies, schemas, and services related to recipes.

methods.name: Recipe create_recipe(payload: RecipeCreate, db: Session = Depends(get_db), user: User = Depends(current_user))
methods.description: Creates a new recipe owned by the current user, using data from the request payload.

methods.name: Dict[str,Any] list_recipes( db: Session = Depends(get_db), page: int = Query(1, ge=1, description="1-based page number"), page_size: int = Query(10, ge=1, le=100, description="Items per page"), )

Dict[str,Any] list_my_recipes( db: Session = Depends(get_db), user: User = Depends(current_user), page: int = Query(1, ge=1, description="1-based page number"), page_size: int = Query(10, ge=1, le=100, description="Items per page"), )
methods.description: Lists recipes owned by the current user with pagination.

methods.name: Recipe get_recipe(recipe_id: int, db: Session = Depends(get_db))
methods.description: Retrieves a recipe by its ID.

methods.name: Recipe update_recipe( recipe_id: int, payload: RecipeUpdate, db: Session = Depends(get_db), recipe: Recipe = Depends(recipe_owned_by_current_user), )
methods.description: Updates an existing recipe owned by the current user.

methods.name: delete_recipe( recipe_id: int, db: Session = Depends(get_db), recipe: Recipe = Depends(recipe_owned_by_current_user), )
methods.description: Deletes a recipe owned by the current user.

ctags.name: create_recipe
ctags.pattern: /^def create_recipe(payload: RecipeCreate, db: Session = Depends(get_db), user: User = Depends(cur/
ctags.signature: (payload: RecipeCreate, db: Session = Depends(get_db), user: User = Depends(current_user))

ctags.name: delete_recipe
ctags.signature: ( recipe_id: int, db: Session = Depends(get_db), recipe: Recipe = Depends(recipe_owned_by_current_user), )

ctags.name: get_recipe
ctags.pattern: /^def get_recipe(recipe_id: int, db: Session = Depends(get_db)) -> Recipe:$/

ctags.signature: ( db: Session = Depends(get_db), user: User = Depends(current_user), page: int = Query(1, ge=1, description="1-based page number"), page_size: int = Query(10, ge=1, le=100, description="Items per page"), )

ctags.name: list_recipes
ctags.signature: ( db: Session = Depends(get_db), page: int = Query(1, ge=1, description="1-based page number"), page_size: int = Query(10, ge=1, le=100, description="Items per page"), )

ctags.signature: ( recipe_id: int, payload: RecipeUpdate, db: Session = Depends(get_db), recipe: Recipe = Depends(recipe_owned_by_current_user), )
